Package main.TradeSystem.Managers

Class TraderManager

java.lang.Object

public class TraderManager
extends java.lang.Object
Used for the actions of a Trader

  • Constructor Details

    • TraderManager

      public TraderManager​(java.lang.String traderId) throws java.io.IOException, UserNotFoundException, AuthorizationException
      This is used for the actions that a trader user can do
      Parameters:
      traderId - this is the user id of the trader account
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if something goes wrong with getting database
      UserNotFoundException - if the user id passed in doesn't exist
      AuthorizationException - if the user is not a trader or if the user is frozen

  • Method Details

    • getRequestedTradeId

      public java.lang.String getRequestedTradeId​(int requestedTradeIndex) throws UserNotFoundException, java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException, AuthorizationException
      Gets the tradeID given the index of the users requested trade
      Parameters:
      requestedTradeIndex - index of the requested trade
      Returns:
      the trade ID
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - userId not found
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - index out of bounds
      AuthorizationException - if the user isn't a trader

    • getAcceptedTradeId

      public java.lang.String getAcceptedTradeId​(int acceptedTradeIndex) throws UserNotFoundException, java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException, AuthorizationException
      Gets the tradeID given the index of the Database.users accepted trade
      Parameters:
      acceptedTradeIndex - index of the accepted trade
      Returns:
      the trade ID
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - userId not found
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - index out of bounds
      AuthorizationException - if the user isn't a trader

      public void addRequestItem​(java.lang.String itemId) throws UserNotFoundException, AuthorizationException
      Makes this user request an item
      Parameters:
      itemId - id of the item to add
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the user was not found
      AuthorizationException - if the user isn't a trader

    • getItemByIndex

      public java.lang.String getItemByIndex​(java.lang.String traderId, int index) throws UserNotFoundException, AuthorizationException, TradableItemNotFoundException
      Gets a tradable item id by index in available items
      Parameters:
      traderId - the trader id
      index - the index
      Returns:
      the tradable item id
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if user isn't found
      AuthorizationException - if user a trader
      TradableItemNotFoundException - if the item wasn't found

    • addToWishList

      public void addToWishList​(java.lang.String tradableItemId) throws UserNotFoundException, AuthorizationException
      Adds an item to this trader's wishlist
      Parameters:
      tradableItemId - the item to be added to this user's wishlist
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the trader with the given userId is not found
      AuthorizationException - if the user isn't a trader

    • getAvailableItems

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getAvailableItems​(java.lang.String userID) throws UserNotFoundException, AuthorizationException
      get all available items
      Parameters:
      userID - user Id
      Returns:
      arraylist of all items in all inventories
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the trader doesn't exist
      AuthorizationException - if the user isn't a trader

      Parameters:
      status - if the user requested to be unfrozen
      Throws:
      AuthorizationException - if the user is not a trader
      UserNotFoundException - if the user wasn't found
